programme.title: Bulldozer, (2021, Thriller)

programme.title: Servos da Guerra, (2022, Thriller)

programme.title: Risco Absoluto, (2010, Drama)

programme.title: Luta Pela Liberdade, (2022, Action)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Kuma is ordered by the World Government to obliterate every living being on the island, but the Straw Hats battered as they may be refuse to go down without a fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT REPELS EVERYTHING / KUMA'S PAW-PAW POWER

programme.title: A heated confrontation occurs between Zoro and Sanji as they argue over who will sacrifice themselves to save Luffy, but Kuma's final attack may be worse than death.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PAIN OF MY CREWMATES IS MY PAIN / ZORO'S DESPERATE FIGHT

programme.title: Sanji learns the truth about Zoro's amazing sacrifice, and Brook is overjoyed to learn that Laboon is still alive and doing fine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PROMISE FROM A DISTANT DAY / THE PIRATES' SONG AND A SMALL WHALE

programme.title: A flashback reveals the story of how Laboon and Brook became friends and the promise that was made at the hour of their sorrowful parting of the ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S PAST / A SAD FAREWELL WITH HIS CHEERFUL COMRADE

programme.title: Brook remembers the painful loss of his beloved captain, the tragic end to his musical pirate crew, and his lonely days as a skeleton adrift in the shadows.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BINK'S BREW / THE SONG THAT CONNECTS THE PAST WITH THE PRESENT

programme.title: Brook officially signs on as the newest member of the Straw Hats, and Luffy learns that his brother Ace may be in some serious trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A NEW CREWMATE! THE MUSICIAN, HUMMING BROOK

programme.title: The Straw Hats encounter two young girls who are looking for their father, and Luffy has another run in with the devious Captain Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SLOW-SLOW MENACE / "SILVER FOX" FOXY RETURNS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats attempt to destroy a floating resort in order to reunite two sisters who possess a blueprint for making jewels!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SCRAMBLE FOR TREASURE / COLLAPSE! SPA ISLAND

programme.title: Brook struggles to adjust to life among living after so many years alone in the darkness. Can the Straw Hats survive his chaotic attempts to fit in?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S GREAT STRUGGLE / IS THE PATH TO BECOMING A TRUE COMRADE RIGOROUS?

programme.title: After surviving a terrible storm to reach the entrance to the Red Line, Luffy slugs a mysterious sea monster and Sanji may finally get to meet a mermaid!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HALFWAY ACROSS THE GRAND LINE / ARRIVAL AT THE RED LINE!

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats agree to help a mermaid rescue her friend, but the mission gets dangerous when a gang of flying fish dive bomb their boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HE HATES THE STRAW HAT CREW / IRON MASKED DUVAL MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: The Straw Hats agree to join Camie's rescue mission, but her captured friend turns out to be a dangerous enemy from the past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FATED REUNION! SAVE THE CAPTIVE FISHMAN

programme.title: The Straw Hats wage a death-defying battle with a group of flying fish, and Luffy is shocked by the familiar face of their latest enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TRAGEDY! THE TRUTH HIDDEN UNDER DUVAL'S MASK

programme.title: Sanji squares off against his lookalike, Camie shows off just how fast a mermaid can swim, and Luffy defeats a giant bull without even landing a blow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXPLOSION! SUNNY'S SUPER-SECRET WEAPON, GAON CANNON

programme.title: After their showdown with Duval, Luffy and the Straw Hats enjoy a hearty meal before proceeding to the site of their next adventure an island bursting with bubbles!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DISEMBARKING WITH SIGHTS SET ON FISH-MAN ISLAND / THE SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stop at an island overflowing with bubbles to get their ship modified for underwater travel, but it's not long before they stumble upon an outrageous explosion and attract unwanted attention.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TYRANNY! THE RULERS OF SABAODY, THE CELESTIAL DRAGONS

programme.title: Shakky explains why Sabaody Archipelago seems to be crawling with bounty hunters eleven of the Grand Line's most wanted pirates are currently ashore and two of them are in Luffy's crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A mysterious stranger keeps Zoro from tangling with a powerful Celestial Dragon, and Chopper goes bonkers when Camie disappears from the amusement park.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE TARGET IS CAMIE!! THE LOOMING CLUTCHES OF A PROFESSIONAL KIDNAPPER

programme.title: Camie was abducted by a dastardly gang of kidnappers, and her next stop is the auction house unless the Straw Hats can rescue her. To make it in time, they'll have to hitch a ride on some flying fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: RESCUE CAMIE / THE ARCHIPELAGO'S LINGERING DARK HISTORY

programme.title: With a little help from their fishy mates, the Straw Hats make it to the auction house in time to save Camie, but explosive elements prevent them from taking her back by force. Luckily, Nami's concocted a very generous plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TIME LIMIT / THE HUMAN AUCTION BEGINS

programme.title: Nami's plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed Celestial Dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIST EXPLODES! DESTROY THE AUCTION

programme.title: Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a Celestial Dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAJOR PANIC! DESPERATE STRUGGLE AT THE AUCTION HOUSE

programme.title: They saved Camie from the auction block, but now the Straw Hats are surrounded by a fleet of marines. Lucky for Luffy, Eustass "Captain" Kidd and Trafalgar Law are ready to join the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU TAKES ACTION! SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO THROWN INTO CHAOS

programme.title: The Straw Hats join forces with Kidd's crew and Trafalgar's mates to make short work of the marines, but they're in for a surprise when they encounter a Warlord of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE SIEGE! THE NAVY VS. THE THREE CAPTAINS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew duck the marines by hiding out at Rayleigh's house. While Chopper tends to Hachi, Rayleigh entertains the Straw Hats with tales of his days as first mate on Gold Roger's ship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ROGER AND RAYLEIGH - THE KING OF THE PIRATES AND HIS RIGHT HAND MAN

programme.title: Admiral Kizaru has arrived to lead the marines on a mission to wipe out all pirates. Meanwhile, Luffy and his crew prepare for a deadly battle with one of the Warlords of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NO ESCAPE!? ADMIRAL KIZARU'S LIGHT SPEED KICK!!

programme.title: A groovy pirate belts out a tune that leaves Kizaru in pieces, but the admiral pulls himself together in time for a crushing Light Speed Kick. Luffy and Sanji try to protect the injured Zoro from a Warlord lookalike.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OVERWHELMING! THE NAVY'S FIGHTING WEAPONS, THE PACIFISTAS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats narrowly defeat a robot that resembles one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. But before the dust settles on the field of battle, a far deadlier foe comes looking for a fight.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EVEN STRONGER ENEMY APPEARS! THE BATTLE AXE-CARRYING SENTOMARU

programme.title: Zoro's barely breathing, and Admiral Kizaru is ready to stomp him into oblivion. The battered and beaten Straw Hats could certainly use a powerful friend right about now.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU'S FIERCE ASSAULT / THE STRAW HATS FACE CERTAIN DEATH!

programme.title: One by one, the mighty paw-print of Bartholomew Kuma makes the Straw Hats disappear until only Luffy remains. To where did his mates vanish? And will he ever see them again?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ELIMINATED FRIENDS - THE FINAL DAY OF THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Yesterday, the Straw Hats valiantly battled a Warlord of the Sea. Today, Boss Luffy and his friends at the Pinwheel Diner prepare to compete in the Great Portable Shrine Race!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / BOSS LUFFY APPEARS AGAIN

programme.title: Thriller Company sabotages the race for a sacred treasure, and the displaced Straw Hats must pull an all-nighter to rebuild their shrine and score some ancient gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / DEFEAT THRILLER COMPANY'S TRAP!

programme.title: Luffy finds himself stranded and starving on a strange island. The rubber-man's amazing appetite puts his manhood in danger when he devours an array of exotic mushrooms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING! THE ALL-FEMALE ISLAND, AMAZON LILY

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsne Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsne Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsne Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiance, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: The Crow: Salvation, (2000, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The fourth film in the dark superhero franchise is an epic new action tale. After an ex-con tries to straighten out his life, he and his girlfriend are brutally murdered by a renegade gang. A mysterious crow brings him back for revenge and redemption.

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: Back In The Saddle, (1941, Western)
programme.desc: When pollution poisons hundreds of cattle, Gene Autry, faces trouble from all sides. Originally released in 1941, this film features Gene's signature song and his lovable sidekick, Smiley Burnette.

programme.title: Heart Of The Rio Grande, (1942, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tames a spoiled teenage shrew sent to a Dude Ranch for the summer and in the process humanizes her father into being a better parent. Action includes stampeding horses, and a bold rescue!

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: Cast A Long Shadow, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Audie Murphy plays Matt, a troubled saddle tramp with a penchant for drinking. When he inherits a massive ranch, it leads him back into the arms of an old flame (Terry Moore), as well as into the fists some old rivals who would rather see him dead.

programme.title: The Cowboy And The Indians, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry runs in to opposition when he tries to aid starving Navajos. The Chief is found unconscious and his necklace gone. Lakohna, the successor, is blamed. Gene and Lakohna join to seek justice.

programme.title: Man of the West, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Gary Cooper demonstrates why he will always be remembered as one of the most authentic stars of the screen. Capable yet vulnerable, Cooper's portrayal of a former outlaw whose past returns to haunt him ranks among his very best.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaskas population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husbands murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Vertical Limit, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An emotionally-charged action-adventure tale of a retired climber (O'Donnell) who must launch a treacherous and extraordinary rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his estranged sister and her summit team in a race against time.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley (Bill Murray), set out to bring down the bad guys.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle, (2003, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: The "Angels", three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles.

programme.title: Vertical Limit, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An emotionally-charged action-adventure tale of a retired climber (O'Donnell) who must launch a treacherous and extraordinary rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his estranged sister and her summit team in a race against time.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Changing Lanes, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Late for court, an attorney weaves in and out of traffic. In a different lane, a father whose right to see his children rests on getting to court on time. A minor accident will turn these two strangers into beasts.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia demands that Helios give up the Golden Crystal in exchange for Sailor Chibi Moon. The Sailor Guardians are struggling to defeat Zirconia.
programme.sub-title: The Golden Crystal Appears: Nehalennia's Magic

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia regains her full power and proceeds to put the world into an eternal slumber.Sailor Moon tries to activate the power of the Golden Crystal.
programme.sub-title: When the Crystal Shines: The Beautiful Power of Dreams

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Golden Crystals power defeats Nehelenia, pushing her back into the abyss. Nehelenia tries to take Sailor Chibi Moon with her.
programme.sub-title: Dreams Forever: Fill the Heavens with Light

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends start their new lives as high school girls. Nehalennia breaks out of her prison to seek revenge against the Sailor Guardians.
programme.sub-title: The Flower of Nightmares Scatters: The Queen of Darkness Returns

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru starts to age at an accelerated rate, from a baby to a young girl within days. She warns of coming danger that will soon befall Sailor Moon.
programme.sub-title: Saturn Awakens: The Ten Sailor Guardians Unite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The city is being plagued by a strange illness that causes people to become obsessed with staring into the mirror for hours, even days.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Mirror: Mamoru Caught in a Nightmare

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted To make matters worse, Nehalennias action is starting to cause a time paradox.
programme.sub-title: Night of Destiny: The Sailor Guardians' Ordeals

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon runs off to save Mamoru from Nehalennia. The rest of the Sailor Guardians try to go after her, but they fall victim to Nehalennias traps.
programme.sub-title: For Love: The Endless Battle in the Dark World

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehalennias palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. The two Guardians are unable to free him.
programme.sub-title: Moon Power of Love: The Nightmare Ends

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru tells Usagi that hes accepted an offer to study abroad in the U.S., which will force them to have a long-distance relationship.
programme.sub-title: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi runs into Seiya and is annoyed by his cocky attitude. The next day, Seiya and the rest of Three Lights have transferred to her school.
programme.sub-title: A School Storm: The Transfer Students Are Idols

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant. But Minako soon realizes that being a star is not all fun and glamor.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director.
programme.sub-title: Fighter's Secret Identity: The Shocking Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami invites Taiki to come and watch the Watarus Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher Amanogawa, only to be rejected.
programme.sub-title: A Star of Dreams and Wishes: Taiki's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls are searching for Luna, who has gone missing. To their surprise, they find Luna being introduced on TV as Yatens pet cat.
programme.sub-title: Luna's Discovery: The Real Face of Yaten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.
programme.sub-title: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls try to buy tickets to a Three Lights concert. Michiru gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be preforming.
programme.sub-title: Calling of the Shining Stars: Enter Haruka and Michiru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seiya asks Usagi out on a date, to which she agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiyas star seed.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Luna encounter a girl who appears to be lost. The two are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagis house as her younger sister.
programme.sub-title: Invaders from Outer Space: The Coming of Siren

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.
programme.sub-title: The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi ends up agreeing to let Seiya spend the night at her place. Worried about leaving two teenagers together, the rest of the girls decide to join.
programme.sub-title: A Night Alone Together: Usagi in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki begins to question if their activity as Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess.
programme.sub-title: Taiki's Song Filled with Passion and Faith

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious where shes getting the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi.
programme.sub-title: Chibi-Chibi's Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi teamed up with Seiya for the school softball tournament. Usagi becomes a target of Seiyas jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Power of a Star: Chibi-Chibi's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. She sets a trap on a plane in order to get Usagis attention.
programme.sub-title: Invitation to Terror: Usagi's Night Flight

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A rift is created between the Sailor Guardians and the Star Lights after they discover each others secret identities.
programme.sub-title: Duty or Friendship: Conflict Between the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and the other Outer Guardians warn the Star Lights to never see Sailor Moon again. Usagi is worried about Seiya after he gets injured.
programme.sub-title: Truth Revealed: The Star Lights' Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Butterflies of Light: A New Chapter on the Horizon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of becoming an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest.
programme.sub-title: Go for Your Dream: Minako Becomes an Idol

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moons true identity.
programme.sub-title: The Stolen Silver Crystal: Princess Kakyu Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.
programme.sub-title: Crusade for the Galaxy: Legend of the Sailor Wars

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that shes been unable to get in touch with Mamoru. The Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: A Famlia da Noiva
programme.desc: Um casal tem uma grande surpresa quando sua filha anuncia seu casamento no dia da sua boda de prata.

programme.title: Show de Vizinha
programme.desc: Um estudante do ensino mdio se apaixona por sua vizinha, e descobre que ela uma atriz porn.

programme.title: Assassino em Srie

programme.title: Centurio

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo
programme.desc: Um bombeiro fora de servio testemunha um assassinato nas mos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteo a testemunhas at depor, mas no pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, ento decide agir por conta prpria.

programme.title: Perseguio Mortal
programme.desc: O ladro realiza o roubo de sua vida quando rouba o traficante psictico, Temple. O plano corre bem at que o ladro descobre um clandestino em seu carro de fuga: a esposa grvida de Temple, Mia.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano
programme.desc: Patrick Bateman um yuppie de Wall Street, obcecado com sucesso, status, estilo, com uma noiva deslumbrante. Ele tambm um assassino psictico que estupra, mata e desmembra estranhos e conhecidos sem provocao ou propsito.

programme.title: Halloween II: O Pesadelo Continua
programme.desc: O assassino enlouquecido Michael Myers retorna, e est ainda mais determinado em matar Laurie Strode de uma vez por todas. Enquanto isso, ela tenta descobrir a verdade sobre o motivo pelo qual ele quer tanto a sua morte.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 3
programme.desc: Ao lado de sua nova aprendiz Amanda,o manipulador por trs dos jogos cruis e complexos, que aterrorizaram uma comunidade e chocaram a polcia, mais uma vez escapa de ser capturado e desaparece.

programme.title: O Grito
programme.desc: Karen uma enfermeira americana que vive em Tquio e exposta a uma misteriosa maldio sobrenatural: um esprito vingativo que possui uma pessoa com uma raiva poderosa antes de reivindicar sua vida e se espalhar para outra vtima.

programme.title: O Grito 2
programme.desc: Com Amber Tamblyn e Arielle Kebbel. Em Tquio, a irm de uma garota previamente morta por uma maldio maligna acidentalmente infligida a si mesma. Com a ajuda de um jornalista, ela deve aprender como impedi-lo de uma vez por todas.

programme.title: Sombra da Morte
programme.desc: Christy volta para casa aps a morte de sua irm Vanessa, e assombrada por profticas vises de violncia e assassinato, que comeam a se tornar realidade.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Histria de um Assassinato
programme.desc: Vera, uma famosa atriz de Nova York, deixa seu ex-namorado problemtico entrar em seu apartamento. Tudo se complica quando ele decide atac-la.

programme.title: Crimes Cruzados
programme.desc: As complicaes surgem durante uma situao perigosa de refm em um restaurante.

programme.title: Entre a Vida e a Morte
programme.desc: Ben Garvey leva uma vida simples ao lado de sua esposa Lisa e a filha Katie. Ele trabalha duro no Fort Garry Brewery Company, mas ainda est em perodo de experincia. quando recebe a visita de seu irmo Ricky, que acabou de deixar a priso.

programme.title: Acima da Lei
programme.desc: Um ex-mafioso que se tornou empresrio e um detetive da polcia devem lutar com um ex-policial sujo que quer levar o assassino de seu filho justia.

programme.title: O Corvo III: A Salvao
programme.desc: Alex Corvis um jovem injustamente condenado cadeira eltrica pelo brutal assassinato de Lauren, sua namorada. Pelo poder mgico do corvo, Corvis retorna do mundo dos mortos para vingar a morte de Lauren e limpar seu nome.

programme.title: O Reino Python
programme.desc: Em uma remota cidade montanhosa, um caador rastreia uma pton gigante e seu mestre para salvar seu povo de seu reinado mortal.

programme.title: Assassinos do Espao

programme.title: O Som do Trovo
programme.desc: No ano de 2055, o esporte predileto dos ricos viajar no tempo para caar dinossauros. A diverso tem apenas uma regra: proibido trazer do passado qualquer lembrancinha, viva ou morta, j que isto geraria uma srie de reaes que modificaria o presente

programme.title: Voo 7500

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua
programme.desc: Aps os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de gua na Terra, uma nave enviada at Tit, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a misso de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Fuga do Vulco
programme.desc: Quando um avio comercial fica preso dentro de um crculo de vulces em erupo, os passageiros e a tripulao precisam encontrar uma maneira de sobreviver - sem aterrissar.

programme.title: Em Busca da Fama
programme.desc: Arielle (Bella Thorne) uma jovem de uma cidade pequena da Florida que trabalha em um restaurante, mas sempre quis mais para a sua vida: fama, popularidade, e admirao.

programme.title: Acima da Lei
programme.desc: Um ex-mafioso que se tornou empresrio e um detetive da polcia devem lutar com um ex-policial sujo que quer levar o assassino de seu filho justia.

programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: Redeno

programme.desc: Sawa perde o pai policial e a me, vtimas de um macabro duplo homicdio. Com a ajuda do parceirode seu pai, Karl Aker, e uma misteriosa amiga de seu passado Sawa comea uma perseguio implacvel em busca de quem os matou.

programme.title: O Drago Invencvel

programme.title: Honra

programme.desc: Em uma escola secundria onde o uso de drogas aumentou, o diretor decide reduzir o uso de drogas realizando um teste de drogas em todos. Dois alunos com medo de dar positivo tm a ideia de que todos vo dar positivo para comer bolos com maconha.

programme.desc: O aluno do ltimo ano do ensino mdio, Kelly Ernswiler (Shia LaBeouf), encontra refgio mergulhando em reconstituies das batalhas picas da Segunda Guerra Mundial. L, ele vira amigo de uma garota e sua vida comea a explodir de forma inesperada.

programme.title: Como Treinar o Seu Marido
programme.desc: Uma terapeuta matrimonial tenta consertar seu prprio casamento concentrando-se em como mudar seu marido.

programme.desc: Uma comdia centrada na vida de Kate Reddy, uma executiva financeira que a ganha-po do seu marido e dos seus dois filhos.

programme.title: O Nerd Vai Guerra
programme.desc: O aluno do ltimo ano do ensino mdio, Kelly Ernswiler (Shia LaBeouf), encontra refgio mergulhando em reconstituies das batalhas picas da Segunda Guerra Mundial. L, ele vira amigo de uma garota e sua vida comea a explodir de forma inesperada.

programme.title: Solteiros com Filhos
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig, Maya Rudolph e Jon Hamm estrelam ao lado de Jennifer Westfeldt e Adam Scott em uma "comdia inteligente e espirituosa de relacionamento" (Entertainment Weekly) sobre um crculo de amigos cujas vidas mudam quando eles tm filhos.

programme.desc: Maggie e Jamie comeam um relacionamento que os confronta com a doena e a droga do amor.

programme.title: Prova de Fogo
programme.desc: No trabalho o Capito Caleb vive pelo velho ditado dos bombeiros: Nunca deixe o seu companheiro para trs. Em casa, ele vive pelas prprias regras. Agora Caleb ter o seu trabalho mais rduo, resgatar o corao de sua esposa.

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: O chofer de uma rica famlia envia sua filha Sabrina a Paris para ela superar uma paixo pelo playboy da famlia, David. Ela volta e atrai a ateno de David, que est para se casar. O irmo dele, Linus, tenta impedir, mas tambm se encanta com ela.

programme.desc: Quando Megan conhece o homem com quem sonhou enquanto estava em coma, ela o ajuda a se apaixonar por ela.

programme.desc: Separado de sua linda mas distante esposa, Vincent tem um caso com uma escritora alegre e passional, cujo amor a promessa de um novo comeo. Mas Vincent permanece dividido entre as duas mulheres, colocando sua felicidade em risco.

programme.title: Um Crime de Paixo

programme.title: Confisses de um Sedutor
programme.desc: Byron um homem casado que escreve livros que ningum l. Desesperado e falido, ele aceita a proposta de trabalho de Luther Fox, diretor de uma agncia de acompanhantes masculinos apenas para mulheres ricas. Assim comea a vida dupla de Byron.

programme.desc: Russell, um operrio da fbrica, tenta proteger seu irmo mais novo, Rodney, de todos os perigos. No entanto, quando este desaparece, Russell decide resolver o problema por conta prpria.

programme.desc: Quando um jovem surfista comea um relacionamento com a sobrinha do traficante Pablo Escobar, ele encontra sua vida em risco aps ser levado para o perigoso mundo dos negcios da famlia de Escobar.

programme.title: Em Busca de Vingana
programme.desc: Um homem traumatizado busca vingana aps ter perdido a esposa e o filho em acidente de avio causado por negligncia de um controlador de trfego areo. Inspirado no acidente de berlingen, no qual os passageiros eram em sua maioria crianas.

programme.title: A Taberna dos Proscritos
programme.desc: Zona Libre um pequeno enclave do outro lado do rio da Amrica. Governado despoticamente pelo General Calleja, oferece refgio aos bandidos, a um preo.

programme.desc: Cowan procura pelo seu amigo de infncia Catlow, mas revela-se que Cowan um oficial de polcia e a relao entre ambos no ser nada fcil. Catlow um ladro, que junto com seus homens, reuniu gado sem marcar e planeja vend-lo em Abilene.

programme.desc: Aps mais um assalto, trs ladres de banco fogem rumo ao deserto. Perseguidos pelo xerife Buck Sweet, eles encontram uma mulher no meio do nada.

programme.desc: Pfeiffer Frankie, uma garonete em um caf nova-iorquino. Aps uma srie de relacionamentos desastrosos, a ltima coisa que Frankie quer um novo homemat o momento em que ele vem procur-la.

programme.title: O Justiceiro

programme.desc: Quando uma simulao de realidade virtual criada com as personalidades de vrios serial killers consegue escapar para o mundo real, um ex-policial tem a misso de deter seu reinado de terror.

programme.desc: Max Walker, um oficial de uma agncia de segurana que regula as viagens no tempo, deve lutar por sua vida contra um poltico sombrio que pretende mudar o passado para controlar o futuro.

programme.desc: Jet Li Wong Fei-Hong, heri chins que vai Amrica, salvo por ndios e luta contra a explorao de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.desc: Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrvel criatura Grendel e a sua me que procura vingana.

programme.title: Um Lobo em Pele de Cordeiro - S1E0
programme.desc: Em uma terra mgica, em um prado calmo onde ovelhas podem viver sem preocupaes, problemas comeam a aparecer quando um grupo de lobos est instalado nas proximidades.

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa - S1E0

programme.desc: Aps sofrerem um acidente de avio em que o piloto morre, Zach, Hannah e seu cachorro Chinook precisam lutar para sobreviver em um lugar selvagem e cheio de perigos. Enquanto isso, sua me comanda a busca pelos filhos e seu co.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 3

programme.title: O Mito

programme.title: Espio por Acaso
programme.desc: Histria verdica sobre o jogo de gato e rato entre o FBI tentando encontrar um espio sovitico em suas fileiras e Robert Hanssen, um dos principais agentes do FBI e o provavel espio.

programme.desc: Com Jessica Alba. Mona Gray uma solitria de 20 anos que buscou consolo na matemtica quando criana depois que seu pai ficou doente. Adulta, ela professora da matria e ajuda seus alunos em suas prprias crises, enquanto tenta se encontrar.

programme.title: Espio por Acaso
programme.desc: Histria verdica sobre o jogo de gato e rato entre o FBI tentando encontrar um espio sovitico em suas fileiras e Robert Hanssen, um dos principais agentes do FBI e o provavel espio.

programme.title: O Menino e o Urso
programme.desc: Nos campos gelados do norte do Canad do norte, Luke descobre que um filhote de urso polar jovem foi separado de sua me e tenta encontrar uma maneira de reunir os dois.

programme.title: 1914 A Primeira Guerra
programme.desc: medida que o sol do vero de 1914 aquece a Europa continental, a Primeira Guerra Mundial desaba sobre a pennsula fraturada. Vivendo em Paris, o holands Arthur Knaap anseia por servir, proteger e defender a sua amada nao.

programme.title: Torturado por Cristo

programme.title: Ao Fim da Trilha
programme.desc: Trs irmos vo para as montanhas para se despedir do pai falecido e espalhar suas cinzas.

programme.desc: Durante os 40 dias de jejum e orao no deserto, Jesus luta contra o Diabo pelo destino de uma famlia em crise.

programme.desc: Um grupo de ativistas, feministas e um mdico decidem abrir um processo contra o governo dos EUA para legalizar o aborto e para isso criam um dos maiores embates sociais e jurdicos da histria.

programme.title: Sobre Rodas
programme.desc: Lucas, 13 anos, volta a escola depois de um acidente que o colocou em uma cadeira de rodas. L, ele conhece Las, tambm de 13 anos, e juntos partem por estradas de terra interioranas em busca do pai que a menina no conheceu.

programme.title: Amores Urbanos
programme.desc: Diego, Jlia e Micaela so trs amigos que moram no mesmo prdio em So Paulo. Na faixa dos trinta anos, eles tentam juntos descobrir onde acaba a juventude e comea a vida adulta, encontrando-se diariamente para dividir experincias.

programme.title: Morte, Vida e Sorte

programme.desc: A trajetria do humorista e sambista Antnio Carlos Bernado Gomes, o "Mussum", contada de diferentes ngulos.

programme.title: O Mentiroso
programme.desc: Quatro companheiros de viagem inusitados caem na estrada sem ter dinheiro ou certeza de para onde esto indo, embarcando em uma jornada que pode lev-los para a to sonhada liberdade.

programme.desc: Johnny um carismtico pregador, que viaja ao lado de sua namorada por todos os Estados Unidos, visitando igrejas e enganando as pessoas ao dizer que possui poderes de cura, at o dia em que ele descobre que os seus poderes so reais.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo - S2E54

programme.title: Luffy, Sanji e Usopp combatem Satori e suas Nuvens Surpresa. O sacerdote usa seu mantra para deter os piratas e deix-los sem rumo na Ilha de Deus.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E25

programme.desc: One Piece - S3E26

programme.desc: One Piece - S3E27

programme.title: Gan Fall sofre queimaduras graves em sua batalha com Shura, e Chopper precisa de coragem para seguir em frente. Enquanto isso, Luffy parece ter descoberto como vencer Satori!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E28

programme.title: O povo de Shandora se prepara para um ataque contra seus adversrios, e Chopper conhece as misteriosas criaturas que salvaram sua vida. J Nami faz incrveis descobertas sobre a origem do Jardim de Cima!
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E29

programme.desc: One Piece - S3E30

programme.desc: One Piece - S3E31
